attributes.action: Remove Rishi Sunak, suella braverman and keir starmer from power
attributes.additional_details: Over 8000 people in Gaza have been killed by Israel! The uk government have failed to demand a ceasefire and hold netenyahu responsible for war crimes against the Palestinians
attributes.background: To remove these individuals from power and to hold them accountable for failing to demand ceasefire. They have played a part in the genocide committed by Israel which has resulted to over 8000 civilians death, they need to be questioned, investigated and put forward to the criminal court of justice

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that calling for Ministers to be removed from office.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that. 

For example, you might like to sign one of these petitions:
Seek a ceasefire and to end Israeli occupation of the West Bank and Gaza Strip
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648292

Call for an immediate ceasefire in Israel and Gaza
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649130
